parameter.name: searchTerm
parameter.description: The partial name or full ID of the users to match and return in the results list.

parameter.name: userId
parameter.description: If included, the user will be queried and if the user is part of the users set, the page parameter will be modified so that the page containing user_id will be returned.

parameter.name: enrollmentType
parameter.description: When set, only return users where the user is enrolled as this type. This argument is ignored if enrollment_role is given.

parameter.name: enrollmentRole
parameter.description: When set, only return users enrolled with the specified course-level role.

parameter.name: include
parameter.description: Include optional details of each user being listed.

parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: Number of entries to be returned in response to a list Request.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Number of the Page to return.

parameter.name: courseId
parameter.description: ID of the course whose users should be listed.
